Title: L'avvocato delle donne
Actors: Mariangela Melato, Rüdiger Joswig, Mareike Carrière
Plot: Irene, an intelligent 45-year-old lawyer, runs a law firm in Rome with her colleague Giulia and aspiring lawyer Alice. She's totally devoted to her 14-year-old son Lorenzo, who has never really recovered from the separation from h...
